headline: Paramount-Skydance's reported bid for Warner Bros. Discovery could spark media bidding war
summary: Paramount Skydance’s reported majority-cash bid for Warner Bros. Discovery has sent WBD shares soaring and sparked speculation of a broader Hollywood bidding war.

headline: Assessing Warner Bros. Discovery After 55% Weekly Rally and Rumored Netflix Deal in 2025
summary: If you have been watching Warner Bros. Discovery stock and wondering what to do next, you are definitely not alone. After a whirlwind stretch that saw shares climb 55.8% in just the past week and rocket 122.3% over the last year, a lot of investors are eyeing the stock and thinking, is it too late to get in or is this only the beginning? Deciding whether to buy, sell, or simply hold has gotten more interesting thanks to industry trends and the recent surge of optimism among media and...

headline: Review & Preview: Waiting for the Rate Cut
summary: The Friday divergence sets up a big week for investors with the Federal Reserve set to meet Tuesday and Wednesday, before announcing its closely watched interest-rate decision Wednesday afternoon.  The tech-heavy Nasdaq stood out today thanks in part to a big gain from Tesla.  “The move comes after Tesla stock added 6% on Thursday, helped in part by in-line inflation data that solidified investors’ belief that rate cuts are coming,” Al wrote today.

raw.headline: Review & Preview: Waiting for the Rate Cut
raw.summary: The Friday divergence sets up a big week for investors with the Federal Reserve set to meet Tuesday and Wednesday, before announcing its closely watched interest-rate decision Wednesday afternoon.  The tech-heavy Nasdaq stood out today thanks in part to a big gain from Tesla.  “The move comes after Tesla stock added 6% on Thursday, helped in part by in-line inflation data that solidified investors’ belief that rate cuts are coming,” Al wrote today.

headline: Foundations Shored Up Endowments in 2024. Nonprofits Need the Funding.
summary: Last year’s average returns of private and community foundations lagged slightly behind 2023, yet still showed double-digit gains. But they still found themselves under pressure from strapped nonprofits.
